revision.text:
'''Cities''' and '''Towns''' are areas in Pokéclicker. They offer access to [[Shops]], [[Gyms]], and certain [[Dungeons]]. For a list of [[Items]] sold at these locations, please check [[Shops]] page. == [[Kanto]] == ===Main Region + Sevii Islands 123=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Town Name !! Closest Routes !!
